title: Considerations on Liver Pathology
content: The aim of this article is to identify the best available evidences analyzing liver samples, normall and pathological. In the study were used liver samples, collected during necropsy, from healthy patients and from patients diagnosed with cirrhosis .This mentioned, are known as routinally practice for hepatitis C diagnosis, which conduct to hepatic cirrhosis.  Were made permanent preparations and used  Hematoxylinâ€“Eosin staining and other special stainings for structural observations at optical microscope using lens with differents magnifications, such us  x10 and x40.
